short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block ads on YouTube. Auto skip video ads. Auto hide banner ads. Our Adblocker Skipper also blocks ads in embedded videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From the makers of the trusted social and streaming ad blockers on iOS and Android—trusted by over 20 million users—comes 'YouTube Adblock by Friendly', a robust browser extension designed to improve your YouTube viewing experience by efficiently blocking all types of ads. As a brand known for our proficient ad-blocking capabilities, we've leveraged our experience to make YouTube even better, by removing unwanted ads from your viewing journey.

Be it annoying preroll ads, disruptive banner ads, or intrusive ad clips, 'YouTube Adblock by Friendly' is the ad blocker that's got you covered. Our ad blocker operates seamlessly, giving you uninterrupted content consumption on YouTube without distractions.

But it doesn't stop at YouTube's main site. Our Adblock extension also works wonders at blocking ads in embedded YouTube videos on external websites. Wherever you're watching YouTube content across the web, our ad block tool ensures it's an ad-free experience.

'YouTube Adblock by Friendly' is equipped with advanced content filtering technology. It utilizes ad-blocking filter lists to block ad-related URLs. This process doesn't just remove intrusive ads, it also speeds up page load times, giving you a smoother and more efficient browsing experience.

Why choose 'YouTube Adblock by Friendly'?
Our ad-blocking extension is designed with the user in mind. Once installed, it operates quietly in the background, freeing you from complex configurations or setups. Install and instantly enjoy the ad-free YouTube experience we provide, coupled with faster page load times and a seamless, uninterrupted viewing experience.

Key Features:

Effective blocking of YouTube ads
Efficient ad-blocking for embedded YouTube videos on external sites
Prevents the loading of preroll ads, banner ads, and other display ads
Accelerates YouTube page load times
If you've had enough of distractions while watching YouTube videos, it's time to try 'YouTube Adblock by Friendly'. We're here to give you control of your content consumption. Install now and experience YouTube the way it was meant to be—ad-free!

YouTube Adblock is built by Sensor Tower.
